column5: Its always being developed and the developer is very quick to respond to emails. Cant rate it any higher!

column2: great app and great support This app literally makes my life easier giving me acces to my home automation on my phone's home screen. I had an issue and contacted the developer who updated the app to fix it within a day.
perfect! works great with all my devices
